summary.para: Contains classes specific to the Windows Forms Validation Module functionality.
The module contained in the DevExpress.ExpressApp.Validation.Win.v23.2.dll assembly.
Creates an instance of the class.

member.name: M:DevExpress.ExpressApp.Validation.Win.ValidationWindowsFormsModule.GetModuleUpdaters(DevExpress.ExpressApp.IObjectSpace,System.Version)

summary.para: Returns the list of updaters that handle database updates for the module.

member.param: An object which is the Object Space used to update the database.
A System.Version object which represents the current database version.
member.returns: An IEnumerable<> list of updaters that handle database updates for the module.

summary.para: Sets up the after it has been added to the XafApplication.Modules collection.

member.param: An object that provides methods and properties to manage the current application.

summary.para: Contains classes and interfaces that allow you to configure your WinForms application in the fluent API-based application builder.
Extends the interface with a method to add the Validation Module to your application.

summary.para: Adds the Validation Module to your application.

Options that you can use to configure the Validation Module.
